article.headline: St. Bonaventure 82, Canisius 75
article.story: ST. BONAVENTURE, N.Y. -- Jonathan Hall scored 20 points to lead five players in double figures in St. Bonaventure's 82-75 win over Canisius on Wednesday night. Chris Matthews scored 15 points, Andrew Nicholson had 14 and Michael Davenport and Ogo Adegboye chipped in 12 each for the Bonnies (7-5). St. Bonaventure trailed 29-28 with 1:49 left in the fist half, but scored 11 straight stretching into the second half. Malcolm Eleby's layup with 18:28 remaining put the Bonnies up 39-29. Hall ended the first half on a dunk at the buzzer for a 33-29 lead. Canisius (6-7) took a 59-53 lead with 10:53 to play, but the Bonnies went on a 13-2 run and didn't trail the rest of the way. Nicholson's layup put St. Bonaventure ahead 66-61 with 5:26 left. Julius Coles scored 22 points and Frank Turner added 15 for the Golden Griffins.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
